name: VNCoreMLRequest
desc: An image analysis request that uses a Core ML model to process images.

items.name: init(model: VNCoreMLModel)
items.desc: Creates a model container to be used with VNCoreMLRequest based on a Core ML model.

items.name: init(model: VNCoreMLModel, completionHandler: VNRequestCompletionHandler?)
items.desc: Creates a model container to be used with VNCoreMLRequest based on a Core ML model, with an optional completion handler.

items.name: var model: VNCoreMLModel
items.desc: The Core ML model on which the request is based, wrapped in a VNCoreMLModel.

items.name: class VNCoreMLModel
items.desc: A container for a Core ML model used with Vision requests.

items.name: var imageCropAndScaleOption: VNImageCropAndScaleOption
items.desc: An optional setting informing the Vision algorithm how to scale an input image.

items.name: enum VNImageCropAndScaleOption
items.desc: Options that define how Vision crops and scales an input image.

items.name: let VNCoreMLRequestRevision1: Int
items.desc: A constant for specifying revision 1 of a Core ML request.
